revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Peplink |model=Pepwave Surf On-The-Go |revision=(SUS-AGN1) |asin=B007BD6GDE |newegg=9SIA4R854P3658 |fcc_date=05/16/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point,range extender |fcc_id=U8G-P1213 |pcb_id=2976370502 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7240;AR7240-AH1A, G44298.1B, 1103, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=64 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H511638G-LCCC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9280;AR9280-AL1A, N3B624.00B, 1050, TAIWAN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz Front End Module;unknown;AN, 043, 98029R;;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.20.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Personal Extended Range WiFi Router}} :[https://www.peplink.com/products/pepwave-surf-on-the-go/ Product page]
"pismolabs", "Pismo315 R2", and "DNI P/N 2976370502" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
''[[Delta Networks]]'' is indeed presumed to be the manufacturer..
Default settings are per the FCC manual. They may be inaccurate.
